name: Bab Al-Harah - باب الحاره
description:
From the famous arabic series. I introduced you this game that talks about a man who tries to escape the "Harah" that it is like a maze while trying to avoid the obstacle in your way.This game is short and contains element that will be provide for the next game.This game is actually demo,so there will be a ful game  depends on the people review it.

In the full game you will explore more than a maze,you will discover new places,discover new eneimes and so much more

Controls;

WASD  or ARROW Keys to move

Move to the prop to interact.

Enjoy
